wordGroup: coal-fired power plant 燃煤发电厂，火力发电厂

sentences.en: Virtually all cooking was done over coal-fired ranges.
sentences.cn: 事实上所有的烹饪都是在烧煤的炉灶上完成的。

sentences.en: The coal-fired steam engine was taking over, and the waterwheel was fast becoming obsolete.
sentences.cn: 烧煤的蒸汽机开始占领市场，于是水车很快就过时了。

sentences.en: The ten-year deal is a vote of confidence in coal-fired power stations.
sentences.cn: 这份10年协议是对燃煤电站的支持。
